      • dumpFrameLatency

        Run frame latency command without ignoring pending fence time
        Parameters:
        windowName - the window name which SurfaceFlinger will acquire frame time for

      • dumpFrameLatency

        public static boolean dumpFrameLatency(java.lang.String windowName,
                                       boolean ignorePendingFenceTime)
        Run frame latency command to get frame time
        Parameters:
        windowName - the window name which SurfaceFlinger will get frame time for
        ignorePendingFenceTime - flag to process frames with pending fence time set true to ignore pending fence time set false to fail the test if pending fence time is not allowed
